data.text: @TieflingKitten Depends on the setting. In forgotten realms? They at least have wet wipes and in big cities: bidets. In Eberron? Robo toilets just wash your butt.  In something savage like Dark Sun... you don't have time to worry about dingleberries.

users.name: Crash
users.description: DM for Life. Currently running/playing and streaming 5 weekly Dungeons & Dragons games Enjoys games, writing, & art. He/Him, They/Them. Discord - CrashGem#7777
